verses.roman:
śuni' haridāsa tabe uṭhiyā calilā
majumadāra sei vipre tyāga karilā

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; tabe—then; uṭhiyā calilā—got up and began to go away; majumadāra—Hiraṇya and Govardhana Majumadāra; sei vipre—this tyāga karilā—kicked out.
translation: Then Haridāsa Ṭhākura got up to leave, and the Majumadāras, the masters of Gopāla Cakravartī, immediately dismissed Gopāla Cakravartī from their service.
